resources.string: We strongly recommend to keep the notifications ON. You don\'t want to miss the a chat notification from your match.
Here to only help friends? Just hide your profile and be a match-maker
Please select your language of choice. The language changes will take place once you go to the home screen.
Never miss an update by whitelisting our app from battery optimisation.
Age range preference allows us to suggest matches accordingly. Some matches may fall outside the specific range.
